definition: to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)
CRT (cathode ray tube) used in a computer monitor or TV, aka picture tube (Tw)/kinescope

sentences.chinese: 更新基於映像部署的客戶機。
基於分區或磁盤映像的部署。

sentences.english: Create and copy virtual machine images to multiple workstations.
sentences.chinese: 創建並複製虛擬機映像到多個工作站。

sentences.english: Copying the respective virtual image template to the corresponding hypervisor.
sentences.chinese: 將各個虛擬映像模板複製到對應的管理程序。

sentences.english: A new image is generated in your private catalog.
sentences.chinese: 在您的私有目錄中生成了一個新的映像。

sentences.english: Hao Bin as Eros, meanwhile, left everybody astonished.
sentences.chinese: 而郝斌飾演的愛神給人留下了震撼的映像。

sentences.english: Now let's look at the instructions to parameterize an image.
sentences.chinese: 現在，讓我們看一下映像參數化的說明。

sentences.english: Attach the storage to the OS images in the disaster data center.
sentences.chinese: 將存儲設備連接到災難數據中心的操作系統映像。

sentences.english: Highlight a backup image and move to the right panel.
sentences.chinese: 高亮顯示備份映像，並移動到右邊的面板。

sentences.english: The kernel deserializes the image when the configuration is started.
sentences.chinese: 內核在配置開始時對映像進行反串行化處理。

sentences.english: Create an instance based on the image.
sentences.chinese: 在這個映像基礎上創建一個實例。

sentences.english: There are also short videos introducing each image that can be viewed online. The IBM Tivoli Monitoring image includes
sentences.chinese: 另外還有介紹每個映像的簡短視頻可在線觀看。

sentences.english: Create a logical volume for the original image.
sentences.chinese: 爲原映像創建一個邏輯卷。

sentences.english: Plate will then only show the reflection of our desired product.
sentences.chinese: 作爲地面的反射板只會顯示我們想要的產品映像。

sentences.english: As an end user, you can have only private images.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個最終用戶，可以只有專用映像。

definition: to produce an item/output/items that are produced
